text: Tamarathi evum to kyareya nahim tha'i sake ke potani dareka patni'omam dareka rite n'yaya karo, bhalene tame te babate ketaliya iccha ane mahenata kari lo, etala mate phakata eka ja tarapha jhukava rakhi biji (patni) ne vacce latakavi na rakho ane jo tame sudharo kari lo ane darava lago to ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala khuba ja mapha karanara ane daya karanara che
